title: "file source not found for" errors and files/folders do not get uploaded
body:
situation: user1 shares his folder "shared" to user2 with full rights (create, update, delete, share)
user 2 creates bunch of new files and folders via linux client (ubuntu)

these do not get replicated to the server and bunch of these errors appear:

error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /dunajske-recepty.pdf	january 4, 2013, 16:14
error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /aukcia.jpeg	january 4, 2013, 16:14
error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /02	january 4, 2013, 16:14
error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /fsdfsdf	january 4, 2013, 16:14
error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /dunajske-recepty.pdf	january 4, 2013, 16:14
error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /aukcia.jpeg	january 4, 2013, 16:14
error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /02	january 4, 2013, 16:14
error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /fsdfsdf	january 4, 2013, 16:14
error	files_sharing	file source not found for: /dunajske-recepty.pdf	january 4, 2013, 16:14

i have tried to turn versioning off (both setting and app), but to no avail.

any ideas?
